overview:
Matt Millar is a mobile entrepreneur based in London.

Matt is currently working on enabling media and broadcast companies to connect with live audiences at www.livetalkback.com

Prior to this Matt ran Adobe’s Mobile & Device division in EMEA for 3 years, bringing Flash to over 1bn mobile devices. He worked at Adobe having had his last startup acquired by Macromedia just before they were acquired by Adobe.

Matt was a member of the Psion Software team that founded Symbian
